org.springframework.web.client.reactive

接口 WebClient


  • public interface WebClient
    Reactive Web client supporting the HTTP/1.1 protocol. Main entry point is through the exchange(ClientRequest) method, or through the retrieveMono(ClientRequest, Class) and retrieveFlux(ClientRequest, Class) convenience methods.

    For example: 

     WebClient client = WebClient.create(new ReactorClientHttpConnector());
 ClientRequest<Void> request = ClientRequest.GET("http://example.com/resource").build();

 Mono<String> result = client
   .exchange(request)
   .then(response -> response.body(BodyExtractors.toMono(String.class)));

    or, by using retrieveMono(ClientRequest, Class): 

     Mono<String> result = client.retrieveMono(request, String.class);
    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Brian Clozel, Arjen Poutsma

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static interface  WebClient.Builder
      A mutable builder for a WebClient.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Return a builder for a WebClient.
      static WebClient create(ClientHttpConnector connector)
      Create a new instance of WebClient with the given connector.
      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ClientResponse> exchange(ClientRequest<?> request)

      <T> reactor.core.publisher.Mono<T> retrieveMono(ClientRequest<?> request, Class<? extends T> elementClass)
      Retrieve the body of the response as a Mono.

    • 方法详细资料

      • exchange

        reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ClientResponse> exchange(ClientRequest<?> request)
        Exchange the given request for a response mono. Invoking this method performs the actual HTTP request/response exchange.

        Note that this method will not publish an exception if the response has a 4xx or 5xx status code; as opposed to retrieveMono(ClientRequest, Class) and retrieveFlux(ClientRequest, Class).

        参数:
        request - the request to exchange
        返回:
        the response, wrapped in a Mono

      • retrieveMono

        <T> reactor.core.publisher.Mono<T> retrieveMono(ClientRequest<?> request,
                                                Class<? extends T> elementClass)
        Retrieve the body of the response as a Mono. A 4xx or 5xx status code in the response will result in a WebClientException published in the returned Mono.
        类型参数:
        T - the element type
        参数:
        request - the request to exchange
        elementClass - the class of element in the Mono
        返回:
        the response body as a mono
        另请参阅:
        ExchangeFilterFunctions.clientOrServerError()

      • retrieveFlux

        <T> reactor.core.publisher.Flux<T> retrieveFlux(ClientRequest<?> request,
                                                Class<? extends T> elementClass)
        Retrieve the body of the response as a Flux. A 4xx or 5xx status code in the response will result in a WebClientException published in the returned Flux.
        类型参数:
        T - the element type
        参数:
        request - the request to exchange
        elementClass - the class of element in the Flux
        返回:
        the response body as a flux
        另请参阅:
        ExchangeFilterFunctions.clientOrServerError()

      • create

        static WebClient create(ClientHttpConnector connector)
        Create a new instance of WebClient with the given connector. This method uses default strategies.
        参数:
        connector - the connector to create connections
        返回:
        the created client

      • builder

        static WebClient.Builder builder(ClientHttpConnector connector)
        Return a builder for a WebClient.
        参数:
        connector - the connector to create connections
        返回:
        a web client builder
